  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.support.v7.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v7.app.AppCompatCallback, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class CloudPageInboxActivity
extends BaseActivity
    CloudPageInboxActivity works as an inbox for the Cloud Pages received.
    Author:
    Salesforce ® 2015.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  CloudPageInboxActivity.MyCloudPageListAdapter
      MyCloudPageListAdapter extends CloudPageListAdapter which is provided by Marketing Cloud's SDK.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemClickListener cloudPageItemClickListener
      Click event listener on the row, it starts a new CloudPageActivity, where the Cloud Page is going to be displayed.
      private android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemLongClickListener cloudPageItemDeleteListener
      Long click event listener on the row, it deletes the Cloud Page.
      private CloudPageInboxActivity.MyCloudPageListAdapter cloudPageListAdapter 
      private android.widget.RadioGroup.OnCheckedChangeListener radioChangedListener
      Listener of the radio buttons, the list is filtered according to the selected option.
